original_text: How great are his signs! and how mighty are his wonders! his kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, and his dominion is from generation to generation.
korean_text: 참으로 크도다 그의 이적이여, 참으로 능하도다 그의 놀라운 일이여, 그의 나라는 영원한 나라요 그의 통치는 대대에 이르리로다

sentences.original_text: and how mighty are his wonders!
his kingdom is an everlasting kingdom,
and his dominion is from generation to generation.
